sourcesContent:
import { SET_GAMER_NAME, BEGIN, END, HEAL, ATTACK, CHANGE_LEVEL, REGAIN_MANA } from '../action'
import { monsterArray } from '../utils'

const initialState = {
  level : 0,
  beeingPlaying : false,
  displayAnimation:false,
  actualMonster : monsterArray[0],
  monsterName: '',
  monsterPvMax: 100,
  monsterPv: 100,
  monsterManaMax: 100,
  monsterMana: 100,
  lvUpMonster : 100,
  messageMonster: '',
  gamerName:'',
  playerPvMax: 100,
  playerPv: 100,
  playerManaMax: 100,
  playerMana: 100,
  lvUpPlayer: 100,
  messagePlayer: '', 
};
const reducer = (state:any = initialState, action:any = {})  => {
  switch(action.type) {
    case SET_GAMER_NAME:
      return {
        ...state,
        gamerName : action.value
      }
    case BEGIN: 
     return {
       ...state, 
       beeingPlaying: true,
       displayAnimation:false,
       playerPv: state.level > 0 ? state.playerPv : state.playerPvMax,
       playerMana: state.level > 0 ? state.playerMana : state.playerManaMax,
       monsterPv : state.monsterPvMax,
       monsterMana: state.monsterManaMax,
       messagePlayer: '',
       messageMonster:'',

     }
     case REGAIN_MANA: 
      return {
        ...state,
        monsterMana :state.monsterMana < state.monsterManaMax ? state.monsterMana + 5 : state.monsterManaMax,
        playerMana: state.playerMana < state.playerManaMax ?  state.playerMana + 5 : state.playerManaMax
      } 
     case HEAL: 
      return {
        ...state,
          playerMana : state.playerMana - 10,
          playerPv: state.playerPv + Math.floor(20 * ( state.lvUpPlayer) /100) >= state.playerPvMax ?
          state.playerPvMax: 
          state.playerPv + Math.floor(20 * ( state.lvUpPlayer) /100),
          messagePlayer: state.playerPv + Math.floor(20 * ( state.lvUpPlayer) /100) >= state.playerPvMax ? 
          state.playerPvMax  - state.playerPv : 
          Math.floor(20 * ( state.lvUpPlayer) /100)
      }
      case ATTACK: {
        if( action.attacker == 'player') {
          return {
            ...state,
            playerMana : state.playerMana -action.manaConsume,
            monsterPv: state.monsterPv - (action.dommageInflige * (state.lvUpMonster ) / 100) <= 0 ?
              0 :
              state.monsterPv - (action.dommageInflige * (state.lvUpMonster ) / 100),
            messageMonster: state.gamerName + ' vous a infliger ' + (action.dommageInflige * (state.lvUpMonster ) / 100) + ' de dommage'
          }
        }
        if( action.attacker == 'monster') {
          return {
            ...state,
            monsterMana : state.monsterMana -action.manaConsume,
            playerPv: state.playerPv - (action.dommageInflige * (state.lvUpPlayer) / 100) <= 0 ?
              0 :
              state.playerPv - (action.dommageInflige * (state.lvUpPlayer) / 100),
            messagePlayer: state.monsterName + ' vous a infliger ' + (action.dommageInflige * (state.lvUpPlayer) / 100) + ' de dommage'
          }
        }
      }
      case CHANGE_LEVEL: 
        return {
          ...state,
          level: state.level + 1,
          playerPvMax : state.playerPvMax + 20,
          playerManaMax : state.playerPvMax + 20,
          monsterPvMax : state.monsterPvMax + 15,
          monsterManaMax : state.monsterManaMax +15,
          monsterName: monsterArray[state.level + 1]
        }
      case END :
        return {
          ...state,
          level : 0,
          gamerName:'',
          monsterName: monsterArray[0],
          beeingPlaying : false,
          displayAnimation:false,
          monsterPvMax: 100,
          monsterPv: 100, 
          playerPvMax: 100,
          playerPv: 100,
          monsterManaMax: 100,
          monsterMana: 100, 
          playerManaMax: 100,
          playerMana: 100, 
       }
    default: return state
  }
}
export default reducer
